properties.description: pipeline loading data from https web source euro_covid data

activities.name: Lookup_ECDC_File_List
activities.description: Activitiy to look up configuration file to fetch data.

properties.description: Population by age data for european countries covid-19 data.
Linked service to azure blob storage contatining population by age data for EU countries.
Data lake to hold population by age data extracted from the azure blob storage container by copy activity.
runs on the creation of data in the target folder.

transformations.name: SelectDaily
transformations.description: Renaming SortDaily to SelectDaily with columns 'country, country_code_2_digit, country_code_3_digit, population, reported_date, hospital, occupancy_count, icu_occupancy_count, source'

scriptLines: SelectReqField2 split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100K']),
